page.title: 10RALSTON GOLF COURSE PAISLEY
page.content:
Ralston Golf Course is 77 years old and covers about 500 square kilometres of undulating land which used to be farmland. It has over 400 members aged between 10 to 80 years. The fees are Â£l89 per year. This money is used to employ a professional golfer, 3 ground staff and good changing facilities.
The members can sit in the well-kept garden area where they can relax with a drink or a snack after their game. One hundred golfers play each weekday but at the weekend the attendance rises to between four and five hundred. Famous golfers play there in competitions. It has a very bright future as there is a long waiting list due to more T.V. coverage of competitions and people having more leisure time.
